ods:objectEntityIri.description: The link to the referenced resource. This could be an internal object linked through the PID or an external object

ods:entityRelationshipDate.description: The data time on which the relationship was established

ods:entityRelationshipOrder.description: When multiple relationships are added an order can be defined
